keywords.Asimov: <abbr title="Creatures possessing this trait cannot attack or defend against creatures with the Human subtype.">Asimov</abbr>
keywords.Changeling: <abbr title="This creature possesses all creature subtypes simultaneously. Any effects which affect a specific subtype apply to Changelings.">Changeling</abbr>
keywords.Graytide: <abbr title="When this creature enters the battlefield, it gains +1/+1 for the number of creatures on your side of the field with Graytide, until the end of the turn.">Graytide</abbr>
keywords.Taunt: <abbr title="All opposing creature attacks must be directed towards the creature with Taunt.">Taunt</abbr>
keywords.First Strike: <abbr title="This creature has attack priority and deals damage before the enemy in combat.">First Strike</abbr>
keywords.Deadeye: <abbr title="This creature can always hit opponents, regardless of effects or immunities.">Deadeye</abbr>
keywords.Squad Tactics: <abbr title="When this creature defeats an opponent's creature in combat, the owner of the defeated card takes 1 lifeshard of damage from combat.">Squad Tactics</abbr>
keywords.Immunity: <abbr title="The creature cannot be affected by card effects or combat of its immunity type. This includes both friendly and opposing effects.">Immunity</abbr>
keywords.Fury: <abbr title="The creature must attack at every possibility.">Fury</abbr>
keywords.Blocker: <abbr title="The creature cannot declare attacks, but can defend.">Blocker</abbr>
keywords.Hivemind: <abbr title="The creature enters combat with a hivemind token on it. The first time this card would take damage, remove that token instead. This does not apply to instant removal effects, only points of damage.">Hivemind</abbr>
keywords.Clockwork: <abbr title="The creature can copy a single keyword on another creature on the field, until they lose the Clockwork keyword or leave the field.">Clockwork</abbr>
keywords.Hulking: <abbr title="Any power above a defending creatureâ€™s resolve is dealt to the opposing player.">Hulking</abbr>
keywords.Double Strike: <abbr title="This creature deals First Strike and Regular damage.">Double Strike</abbr>
keywords.Oo Rah: <abbr title="While attacking alongside 4 or more cards with this effect, all cards with Oo Rah gain +1/+1.">Oo Rah</abbr>
keywords.Carapace: <abbr title="The creature cannot equip equipment cards.">Carapace</abbr>
keywords.Toxic: <abbr title="Any damage the creature deals to opposing creatures is fatal. This does not apply to lifeshard damage.">Toxic</abbr>
keywords.Death-Defying: <abbr title="Any time the creature would be destroyed in combat, flip a coin. If heads, the creature is not destroyed.">Death-Defying</abbr>
keywords.Necrotaint: <abbr title="Only one creature with Necrotaint may be on each player's battlefield at a time.">Necrotaint</abbr>
keywords.Lifedrain: <abbr title="Upon dealing lifeshard damage to an opposing player with a creature with Lifedrain, heal for one lifeshard.">Lifedrain</abbr>
keywords.Stasis: <abbr title="While in Stasis, the creature cannot attack, defend, or activate abilities. Any card effects or keywords they possess remain active, provided they do not cause the creature to attack, defend, or activate an ability.">Stasis</abbr>
keywords.Acid Blood: <abbr title="While defending, if a creature with Acid Blood is destroyed, the creature that destroys it is also destroyed.">Acid Blood</abbr>
keywords.Modular: <abbr title="When this equipment is attached to a creature, the creature gains +1/+1 in addition to the effects listed on the card.">Modular</abbr>
keywords.Systems Nominal: <abbr title="The creature always fights as if at full strength.">Systems Nominal</abbr>
keywords.Exterminate: <abbr title="The creature has +1/0 if fighting a creature with the Human subtype.">Exterminate</abbr>
keywords.Focused: <abbr title="The creature ignores creatures with the Blocker keyword.">Focused</abbr>
keywords.Blood Pawn: <abbr title="Once per turn, a creature with Blood Pawn may be sacrificed to gain mana equal to half of its base resolve.">Blood Pawn</abbr>
keywords.Indestructible: <abbr title="This creature cannot be destroyed by combat damage. Effects, keywords and events can still destroy it, however.">Indestructible</abbr>
